Text.Page: I have some requests for you before you enter the fortress. Will you help me?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What kind of help?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Go and get the poison sacs you'll need to kill the vassals.

The vassals are nagas that betrayed us. They now serve the draakons. Many of our men were attacked by them.

Now it's time for them to pay for what they have done. I believe this would reduce the number of betrayers as well.

Thank you.
The betrayers should be trembling in fear now.

If you don't mind, there's one last request.
We need more poison sacs. Kill Flexis Hunters to get them.
